description.displayText: Emma nannied part-time for our family for a year and a half until we moved to CT. I have two toddlers (1.5 and 3.5) who can be a lot, and Emma took them on in stride. The children were always learning something: new songs and dances, numbers and letter sounds for our 1.5 yo, and early reading, sight words and early mathematics for our 3.5 yo. Our 3.5 yo is top of his class in preschool, and I truly credit her for that! Fun crafts and activities, visiting parks, museums and classes in the city, coordinating and hosting play dates, even attending doctor's appointments. She helped potty-train our 1.5 yo with the utmost patience and love and helped our 3.5 yo navigate separation anxiety when he started summer camp. Emma is wonderful, a caring, patient, intelligent caregiver with a deep love for taking care of children. We are so grateful that we had the opportunity to work with her.

description.displayText: Great! P (3 yrs) and N (9 months) LOVED her. The next morning, Pen kept asking for her. She is the best kind of sitter-really interacts with the kiddos while ensuring safety and keeping space clean. We have another booking with Emma this week and will continue to use her long term!

description.displayText: Wonderful experience having Emma sit for my 16 month old. She was punctual, kind, and warm, and my daughter immediately loved her. Apt was pristine when I arrived home, and my daughter was smiling and laughing playing on the floor with Emma. Will definitely book again.

description.displayText: Amazing! Professional kind and silly. My 2.5 yr old loved her
